name: Planta
description:
If you want to contact me, here is my email: planta.developer@outlook.com


Planta is a third-person open-world survival game with a procedurally generated terrain. It means the map is endless and expands while exploring!
Planta throws you into an unrepeatable adventure in which you focus on gathering resources, building your base, exploring the world and... surviving!

Features

  • Open World - explore the infinite, procedurally and randomly generated map
  • Low-poly graphic style - cute & minimalistic low poly graphic style, looks good and it's also well optimized! Graphics cards love it
  • Freedom of choices - be a man who focuses on chopping trees and expanding a base or becomes an adventurer and travels the world
  • Crafting - Build your personal equipment that helps you survive.
  • Building - Become an architect and build awesome bases that will protect you and your stuff
